org.jetel.data.formatter.provider

Class XLSFormatterProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.formatter.provider.XLSFormatterProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatterProvider

    public class XLSFormatterProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements FormatterProvider
    Provides support for getting the delimited data formatter.
